The tests pass with "org.eclipse.core.runtime" and "org.eclipse.osgi" from HEAD.
Does it happen on other platforms?

I tried twice on GTK+ only.  Both times, the failures occurred.  When I checked
out "org.eclipse.osgi" and "org.eclipse.core.runtime", the failures did not
occur.  However, it could simply be that the test fails intermittently and that
it just happened to succeed when I checked out those packages.

As a note, this box is a P4 configured with SMP (hyper-threading).  If there are
threading or synchronization errors, I seem to have a habit of hitting them....

Tod has had problems with the dynamic tests on his HT machine as well.  In fact,
they don't pass at all...
This is no longer an issue.
